info.name: Unearthed Arcana: Magic Items of Eberron
info.description: This month's Unearthed Arcana looks at the magic items that are part of everyday life in the world of Eberron. Arcane focuses, enchanted clothing, warforged components, and more are all common sights for the citizens of the Five Nations.
info.author: Wizards of the Coast

element.name: Unearthed Arcana: Magic Items of Eberron

description.p: This month's Unearthed Arcana looks at the magic items that are part of everyday life in the world of Eberron. Arcane focuses, enchanted clothing, warforged components, and more are all common sights for the citizens of the Five Nations.
